title: The French King's memorial to the Pope
author: Louis XIV, King of France, 1638-1715.
notes: Half-title: Lettre du roy à Monsieur le Cardinal D'Estrees ecrite à Versailles le 6. septembre 1688 = The French king's letter to Monsieur the Cardinal D'Estrees written from Versailles, Septemb. 6, 1688.
Item at reel 794:6 identified as Wing L3126 (number cancelled).
